title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for browsing, downloading and chatting with Ollama models in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Bring Ollama models into VS Code as a free local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for question answering.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama; Kotlin & Spring Boot examples included.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with streaming and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for generative QA pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio and SSE streaming support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider + Facade for chatting with Ollama models from PHP.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in threads or DMs.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official catalog of ready-to-run models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) and how to import custom GGUFs.
